entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
